snippet: The men claim they faced racial discrimination, poor treatment based on race and retaliation after they complained.
abstract: Group of eight current and former employees of United Parcel Service in Kentucky are suing company, claiming they faced racial discrimination and retaliation after they complained.
lead_paragraph: The men claim they faced racial discrimination, poor treatment based on race and retaliation after they complained.

headline.main: 8 Ex-Workers Claim Bias in Suit Against UPS
headline.print_headline: 8 Ex-Workers Claim Bias in Suit Against Ups
